name: ScriptVOX Studio
description: ScriptVOX Studio is an easy to use text-to-speech tool for writers that will open up a new window on creativity. ScriptVOX will allow you to quickly add voices and images to your story, screenplay or movie script.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista Processor: Pentium IV 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 8.0 DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit sound Card, compatible with DirectX 8.0
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 8.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 40 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit sound Card, compatible with DirectX 8.0
